title: What will be opening up in Burgaw NC a KFC/TACOBELL or just an KFC?
text:
We
are not able to answer every question regarding new restaurant in
various towns, but reporter Judy Royal (judy.royal@starnewsonline.com)
is planning an upcoming column about new business openings in the
area. If you contact her with your question she may be able to include
it in her research.
